title: StaffAiSettings
description: AI settings configuration for a staff member, controlling which AI features and recommendations are enabled

uid.description: A unique identifier for the staff AI settings record

staff_uid.description: The unique identifier of the staff member these settings belong to

created_at.description: The timestamp when the settings were created, in ISO 8601 format

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the settings were last updated, in ISO 8601 format
